Text: Epsilon?

What's the matter, Epsilon? Is there something wrong
with Gamma's report?
N-No! I will now make my monthly report on Luna, Ltd.

Firstly, our fashion division has reached a critical
stage in the development of menswear for mass
marketing.

We have selected vendors for production and
distribution, and after producing prototypes,
we are ready to begin structuring for mass
production.

We're currently conducting background checks on
potential retail vendors and are in the process of
selecting those without Church-backing.

Regarding the Tuna King division, as it is beginning
to gain popularity amongst the middle class...

we plan to target potential upper-class customers as
well by promoting tea produced in the fields of
Alexandria in our drink menu.

Our recognition amongst the crème de la crème of
society, such as the aristocrats, is gradually
increasing, and some wealthy investors have offered
to sponsor the opening of new stores.

Similar to our fashion division, we're conducting
background checks on all potential sponsors.

...I know things were hectic at the start, but your
Luna, Ltd. project seems to be coming along well.

(Until we bought up the shares in the capital, things
were so rough that not a day went by where Gamma
wasn't tripping over herself.)

(But now Luna, Ltd. is starting to take off and is
quickly growing into one of the major divisions in
the Garden's operations.)

Also, as part of Tuna King's marketing initiatives,
we've got up-and-coming novelist Natsume
Kafka—huh?!
Epsilon?
Oh! I-It's nothing. I'll continue...!

...We've got Nastume Kafka to prepare several
hand-sized novel leaflets themed around
Tuna King as novelty items.

We will also serialize these on the ad page of the
Midgar Times as a way to reach a wider audience
of informed readers.

So we'll use the NMA not only as a source for
top-secret intel about the Cult, but also as a
source of business.
And it's all thanks to Beta's talent.
Ack...!

(Oh no... This is not good! Now isn't the time to be
working on my slime bodysuit physique!)

(I'm...the only one in the Seven Shadows, other than
Lady Alpha, who can cure the possessed.)

(But, if I'm being honest, I don't excel in much
outside my control of magic. Even my battle power
is tame in comparison to Delta.)

(Gamma and Eta almost exclusively handle the running
of the Garden and the ancient city of Alexandria's
internal affairs and management.)

(Meanwhile, Zeta is the specialist in espionage and
investigations.)
(And then...there's Beta!)

(Her position continues to expand along with her
breasts!)
(Wait... What if...)
(...the others learn how to cure the possessed?!)
I've got...too many rivals!
Epsilon!

Ah! Lady Alpha! That concludes my report. These
documents include more detailed figures.
R-Right... Thank you.
Well then, if you'll excuse me!

...It's just like Epsilon to produce such
well-organized reports. She's as meticulous
and methodical as ever.

She compares herself a little too much to those
around her to the point that it makes her anxious...
but I think it's time I gave her a more significant
role.
What am I even capable of doing?

Controlling magic...increasing slime volume...baking
sweets...cooking...

They all seem...sort of general and bland. What's
something only I can do?
Something only I'm capable of...

Ninety percent of the time, you already have the
answer lurking inside you.

Start by drinking a cup of tea to calm your mind.
Once you've finished, try moving your hands. It all
begins there.

The Shadow Wisdom that Master Shadow once taught
me... Let's start by drinking a cup of tea—

Mmm. The tea smells so lovely and calming.
Alexandria's climate is perfect for both
growing and drinking tea!

...When Master Shadow shared this Shadow Wisdom with
me, I remember almost giving up on playing the piano
because I couldn't play as well as him.

...Yes, I remember the same thing happened last time
as well. The tea's lovely fragrance relaxed me and
released the tension from my body.
...Tea...fashion business...piano...!

Ohh! Master Shadow! I found the answer...inside of
me!
